title: Describe the process of visiting a hospital in your country.

korean: 한국에서 병원 가는 과정은 비교적 간단해.
요즘은 인터넷으로 미리 예약하는 경우가 많아.
예약 없이 가도 되는데, 기다리는 시간이 길 수 있어.
병원 도착하면 접수처에서 신분증이랑 보험증 제출해.
처음 가는 병원이면 간단한 정보 작성하고.
진료실 들어가면 의사가 증상 물어보고 진찰해.
진료 끝나면 처방전 받아서 약국 가.
수납할 때 건강보험 적용돼서 비용이 저렴한 편이야.
전체적으로 의료 접근성이 좋은 편이라 편해.
english: The process of visiting a hospital in Korea is relatively simple.
First, I decide which hospital I want to go to.
These days, many people make reservations online in advance.
You can go without a reservation, but the waiting time can be long.
When you arrive at the hospital, you submit your ID and insurance card at the reception.
If it's your first time at that hospital, you fill out simple information.
You wait in the waiting room until your name is called.
When you enter the examination room, the doctor asks about symptoms and examines you.
If necessary, you also get tests or X-rays taken.
When the examination is over, you get a prescription and go to the pharmacy.
When paying, health insurance is applied, so the cost is relatively cheap.
Overall, medical accessibility is good, so it's convenient.
